text:
Hey there.
I am currently trying to find a way to append a specific HubSpot Parameter (User ID) to all links in an email as a GET parameter.
E.g. if I create an email with a link to "<http://test.com|test.com>" the user should get a link with "<http://test.com/{|test.com/{> user.ID }". Is this somehow possible with HubL? The best-case scenario would be if this gets applied to all links in all emails globally.
Thanks!

Hi all, i need to integrate something like reviews system for every product i have on the page, it will be something like google reviews with star rating but internal. any idea on how to achieve this? do i store something in hubDB ? is there any plugin available for this? im lost on this issue so any help will be much welcomed !
Thanks!
The (new?) `css` key for the `color` dict is nice but right now it's rendering rgba values with an integer between 0 and 99 for the alpha
